entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Data inconsistency while loading entities based on new changed prop before DispatchDomainEventsInterceptor.SavingChangesAsync #31741
  • No backing field could be found for property ... and the property does not have a setter #31740
  • EFCore deletes an association on DbContext.SaveChanges when an existing link is removed and then added in the same transaction #31736
  • The issue of SQL statements following Sum after Groupby on EF6.0.5 #31733

Closed

  • SQL Server Index options SortInTempDB and DataCompression #30408
    8.0.0-rc2
  • Treat SQL Server Error Number 1222 as Transient (Lock request time out period exceeded) #31724
  • Model Snapshot won't compile with nested types #31735
  • When a parent and child entity has a one to many relationship and the child table is a temporal table, removing a child from its parent collection will trigger an unexpected error. #31535

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #29638 - GroupBy generates invalid SQL when using custom database function #31743
  • [release/7.0] Fix to #30996 - Incorrect translation of comparison of current value with owned type default value #31742
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.x
  • Treat SQL Pool warmup/pause errors as transient #31739
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31738
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Add support for DATA_COMPRESSION and SORT_IN_TEMPDB SQL Server index options #30831
    waiting-for-response
  • [SMALL] Fix to #30996 - Incorrect translation of comparison of current value with owned type default value #31714
  • Treat Sql Error Number 1222 as Transient #31725
